"Okay, that's enough for now," he says, which the monster reluctantly obeys as he drops Ichi to the floor. The tentacles retreat from his holes, leaving him on his back as Shibaru approaches him.

"My little kitten must be thirsty," he coos, picking him up and placing him on his knees and elbows. "Good thing you've made a lot of milk, huh?"

He tugs on the collar towards a pile of Ichi's cum, clearly urging him to lap it up.
